Package DatabaseBoundary

Class DatabaseWriter

Object
DatabaseWriter
public class DatabaseWriter extends Object
A class for writing and updating data into database txt files.

      public static void updateMovieDetails(Movie originalMovieObject, String title, String status, String synopsis, String director, ArrayList<String> casts)
      Updates the details of a Movie object from the Movie database
      Parameters:
      originalMovieObject - A Movie object that details are being updated
      title - A String representing the new title of the movie
      status - A String representing the new status of the movie
      synopsis - A String representing the new synopsis of the movie
      director - A String representing the new director of the movie
      casts - A String representing the new casts of the movie

    • updateShowtimeSeats

      public static void updateShowtimeSeats(String movieTitle, String cineplexID, String cinemaID, String date, String day, String time, Seat[] seats)
      Updates the Seats corresponding to the Showtime
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - A String representing the movie title associated to the showtime
      cineplexID - A String representing the cineplex ID associated to the showtime
      cinemaID - A String representing the cinema ID associated to the showtime
      date - A String representing the date associated to the showtime
      day - A String representing the day associated to the showtime
      time - A String representing the time associated to the showtime
      seats - An array of Seat object representing the new seats associated to the showtime

    • updateShowtimeInfo

      public static void updateShowtimeInfo(String movieTitle, String cineplexID, String cinemaID, String date, String day, String time, String newMovieTitle, String newCineplexID, String newCinemaID, String newDate, String newDay, String newTime)
      Updates the info of the Showtime
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - A String representing the movie title associated to the showtime
      cineplexIDA - A String representing the cineplex ID associated to the showtime
      cinemaIDA - A String representing the cinema ID associated to the showtime
      dateA - A String representing the date associated to the showtime
      dayA - A String representing the day associated to the showtime
      timeA - A String representing the time associated to the showtime
      newMovieTitle - A String representing the new movie title associated to the showtime
      newCineplexID - A String representing the new cineplex ID associated to the showtime
      newCinemaID - A String representing the new cinema ID associated to the showtime
      newDate - A String representing the new date associated to the showtime
      newDay - A String representing the new day associated to the showtime
      newTime - A String representing the new time associated to the showtime

    • createShowtime

      public static void createShowtime(String movieTitle, String cineplexID, String cinemaID, String date, String day, String time, Seat[] seats)
      Creates a new Showtime to the showtime database
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - A String representing the movie title of the new showtime
      cineplexID - A String representing the cineplex ID of the new showtime
      cinemaID - A String representing the cinema ID of the new showtime
      date - A String representing the date of the new showtime
      day - A String representing the day of the new showtime
      time - A String representing the time of the new showtime
      seats - An array of Seat objects representing seats of the new showtime

    • removeShowtimes

      public static void removeShowtimes(String movieTitle, String cineplexID, String cinemaID, String date, String day, String time)
      Removes the Showtime from the showtime database
      Parameters:
      movieTitle - A String representing the movie title of the new showtime
      cineplexID - A String representing the cineplex ID of the new showtime
      cinemaID - A String representing the cinema ID of the new showtime
      date - A String representing the date of the new showtime
      day - A String representing the day of the new showtime
      time - A String representing the time of the new showtime
